headline.main: VICTIMS RODE OWN COFFINS; De Gaulle Reveals Pre-Execution Ordeal of 20 French Hostages

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Aug. 1 -- French hostages saw their own coffins recently as Nazi executioners drove them through the streets of Chavannes in the Eure-et-Loire Department, according to a document issued this evening by General Charles de Gaulle's headquarters of fighting France here.
abstract: Jews reptd rounded up for work on Eastern Front; press repts Jewish enterprises sold by order; Gen de Gaulle repts on pre-execution ordeal of 20 troop train wreck hostages, Chavannes
